name: DOTCREEK
tagline: An Agile Software Development and ITO Company
description:
DotCreek is an Agile Software Development and ITO Company founded in 2011 in San Carlos, Costa Rica with a second delivery center in Managua, Nicaragua since 2014.
We provide custom Web & Mobile development for Small and Medium Enterprises and also Staff Augmentation & Project Outsourcing services to other ICT companies.
With over 20 people working from both sides of the San Juan River, our shared vision is to transcend as a software company, by promoting the desire to innovate and create solutions based on the best web and mobile technologies.
